name: Meteor
text: This website is intended for stock management in a store, which allows control of the database of product brands, types, quantities, and sales history, all in a MongoDB database.
largeText: Meteor is an open-source web and mobile development platform that uses JavaScript on both the client and server sides, with a real-time data system and a wide range of open-source packages and libraries to facilitate integration with other web technologies and services.
